subject: Golf
Solheim Cup (Golf)
Women's British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The former champion Marta Figueras-Dotti, coach of the national women's golf team in Spain, has helped cultivate a cohort of young Spanish stars who are lighting up the game.
snippet: The former champion Marta Figueras-Dotti, coach of the national women's golf team in Spain, has helped cultivate a cohort of young Spanish stars who are lighting up the game.
